title: 2 Bed 2 Bath available NOW! Schedule tour today Near Bart, 24/7 Gym !!
posting_body: 44762 Old Warm Springs Blvd, Fremont, CA, 94538
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1174 Sq.
Nestled in the lively and vibrant community of Fremont, the surrounding neighborhood at Embark is a centrally located area that residents love to call home.
Embark Apartments offers spacious 1, 2, and 3 bedroom homes that are meticulously outfitted with high-end, modern finishes and upgraded features.
Offering an unparalleled amenity package that allows you to effortlessly live your life to the fullest, you’ll never want to leave home.
Everything you need is right here at Embark.
- Kitchen island/breakfast bar with pendant lighting*
- Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas
- Dog wash and self-service grooming area
- Hub by Amazon: secure package lockers
- Resort quality cardio and strength training equipment
Pet friendly – puppies and kittens welcome (breed restrictions apply).
Visit our website for more details.
Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.
Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.
